# init(resource:)

**Initializer**

Creates a URL from a resource.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(resource: URLResource)
```

## Parameters

- **resource**: A [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLResource] that provides a reference to a resource in a given bundle.

## Discussion

Use this initializer to resolve [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLResource] instances, possibly received from other processes, into [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URL] instances.
title: init(resource:)
